meanings.definition: The quality or state of being alternative.
meanings.sent1: Her alternativeness in fashion choices made her stand out from the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The alternativeness of the menu at the restaurant allowed customers to choose from a variety of dishes.
meanings.sent3: The alternativeness of his dance moves brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The alternativeness of the music festival created a unique and vibrant atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The alternativeness of the painting captured the viewer's attention immediately.

meanings.definition: The ability to provide or be a substitute or alternative.
meanings.sent1: His alternativeness in offering solutions to problems impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The alternativeness of the new technology made it a popular choice among consumers.
meanings.sent3: The alternativeness of the cat as a guard animal was both surprising and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The alternativeness of the situation forced them to think outside the box.
meanings.sent5: The alternativeness of the ingredients in the recipe gave it a unique flavor.
